name: Cloud Eau de Parfum Gift Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Set Description: Indulge in this must-have Ariana Grande fragrance set: a gorgeous deluxe-mini duo featuring the irresistible Cloud and Cloud Pink eau de parfums. Itu2019s sure to be the dreamiest gift of the season...About the Bottle: The Cloud bottle embodies the optimism and youthful spirit of gazing at the sky, combined with the digital connotations of the cloud today. It emits a subtle glow and is cradled in a whimsical, white, puffy-cloud base. It's an uplifting experience, resting on a cloud and looking toward a bright future...About the Fragrance: The uplifting Cloud Eau de Parfum conveys Ariana Grandeu2019s heartfelt expression of positivity and joy for her fans. Empowering and optimistic, the Cloud Pink Eau de Parfum draws inspiration from a confidence that radiates beauty and strength, no matter the storm...This Set Contains:- 0.25 oz/ 7.5 mL Mini Cloud Eau de Parfum.- 0.25 oz/ 7.5 mL Mini Cloud Pink Eau de Parfum
ingredients: Cloud Pink Eau de Parfum Mini: .Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water (Aqua/Eau), Citric Acid, Triethanolamine, Limonene, Linalool....Cloud Eau de Parfum Mini:.Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water (Aqua/Eau), Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate (And) Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane (And) Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Coumarin, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to your pulse points (wrist, chest, and neck).

reviews.review_title: Very sweet fragrance but no longevity
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this blindly but had tried some of her fragrances on when we were travelling and seemed to remember liking them so thought I would give these a try.  These are very sweet which I like, they remind me a lot of the Good Girl scents and the sizes are actually bigger than I was expecting so this set is a good value.  However they do not last at all, maybe an hour or two at the most so I will be returning for that reason.  On a side note the packaging these came in are like Fort Knox to get them out, I had to get cutlery to wedge them out of the plastic encasing. Very frustrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great way to try a couple of new scents (as long as you don't mind dabbing) before you make a bigger investment. Plus, the bottles are cute for a vanity or in a collection. I personally like the original Cloud more, but both are nice.
